Отличная игра для малолетних садистов. Позволяет канализировать негатив. Минусы-у маньяков слишком много преимуществ. Например, у трюкача-китайца метание ножей-это тоже самое,что дать маньяку автомат
Fun even when teabagged by 4 friends
Id recommend it but to people that are going to play with friends. Its a very fun game to work together and escape, but it gets less and less fun as you play more and more

I've played DbD from beta and played over 1000 hours cross all DLCs they put out since that beta.

DBD has one of the most toxic communities and it's the result of BHVR doing nothing about it from the release.

The current state of the game is really bad and it's declining past few years. Why? Because BHVR first cares about the money after that they care about their image. What about the community? They don't care at all. You don't believe me?

Try googling #DeadByBoycott or Dead by Daylight boycott... You will find out a long Reddit topic, where people stood up, up a list of things as a huge feedback on what is wrong and what BHVR should do. Result? You will get banned on steam discussion, their own forum, and censored in-game if you mention that hashtag. This is how much they care about the community.

To be really honest... I don't care much about the game anymore after BHVR showed, how much they don't care about their community. Even though I like asymmetrical multiplayer "horror" games I hope this game will die even there is no available alternative to play.

One more time... #DeadByBoycott.
Классная и позитивна игра, подойдет для игры с друзьями.

Pode parecer complicado e frustrante quando você não entende o que um killer faz ou quando você não sabe pra onde correr e é pego. Recomendo ter paciência e tentar aprender o game, assim irá poder desfrutar da melhor sensação do mundo: dar um olé no assassino e ver ele perdido.

Dead by Daylight? Узнал про в 2017 году от друзей, что играли в нее. На тот момент не мог позволить купить из-за слабых характеристик своего ПК. Есть много плюс и минусов. Из минусов это читеры, баги и ,конечно же, токсичное комьюнити дбд. Для себя выделю только один плюс. Когда вы время игры убивает токсичного выжившего, не оставляешь шансов сурвам, играя за Медсестру или Буббу. Смотреть на то, как в порыве ярости выжившие выходят из игры. Оценку ставлю 6 из 10, потому что нет никакой борьбы со стороны разработчиков с токсичными игроками, багами и , конечно же, читерами.

I recommend this game to people that dont care about winning, if you get hooked once, your going to die. They will camp the hook until you die, no matter what, thats the level of skill this game has. Sucks when you play with your friends and one is left behind because he will never leave that hook, ever. Dead by Daylight everybody, its the best!
Este juego es más adictivo que la cocaína

Been playing since 2017, and to this day it entertains me, giving me my fix of horror.
Pros - A lot of replayability especially with friends, however I tried to get more casual gamers involved but it was a bit too intense for them mechanics-wise.
Cons - People in-game can be toxic, a lot of poor sports disconnecting when caught.

[h1]TLDR:[/h1]

I use to love this game

Then SBMM happened

Now I die a little inside bit by bit every time I load this game

[h1]Actual review:[/h1]
In my most recent sessions of playing this game it has never been an enjoyable experience. Every game either consists of both sides sweating to win as using anything that is not meta is just impossible to have fun with when everyone is playing to win. My problem isn't that I'm not getting easy games to stomp teams, my experience with the Matchmaking Rating (MMR) system is that even if I go 10 games without a win, my games are still incredibly sweaty on either side. I attempted using fun builds in which I had little to no success with hoping that I eventually would have less sweaty games but it never changed. I now dread the feeling playing this game as there is no chance of playing it in a chill manner without having fun in my opinion.

There's also many instances where the Skill Based Matchmaking (SBMM) system doesn't even work for new players and are being placed against high level killers right from the start and deterring them from playing, and I don't blame them. As it stands, I cannot recommend this game to anyone which is not what I would have said over a year ago which is sad to see. The game thrives of having completely random matches. There is too much RNG involved to make this game competitive, I am clueless as to why the devs thought adding SBMM to a party game was ever a thought. I understand that newer players need to have an easier introduction to the game but the new system doesn't even work according to newer players.

Everyone's experience is different. Some people are really liking the SBMM change while the majority (from what I've seen) do not seem to enjoy it. As it stand I cannot recommend this game to anyone from personal experience unless changes are made.

I Bought because I wanted to be scared but for me it wasn't scary at all and I kind of wish that you could talk to other players like in Friday the 13th but I guess I'll just keep it. My friend found it fun though

Jogo bem legal. Consegue fazer com que a gente queira progredir com os personagens e está sempre trazendo coisas novas. A única coisa que não curto é que acontece muitas vezes de cair em partidas seguidas com o mesmo killer. E aí se é um killer que não curto, acaba ficando chato. Mas, de modo geral, é bem legal. Viciante!!!

Mas as últimas atualizações têm sido cada vez mais roubadas para os killers, fora a demora para conseguir entrar em partida. O que era pra ser legal, agora tá se tornando chato...
Fun and Chill game. Enjoyable with friends

No me cagaba de miedo jugando a algo desde que descubri Left 4 Dead en 2009, y eso que ahi tenia 10 años, ahora con 21 Dead by Daylight ha logrado recrear eso XD

Dead by Daylight is fun if you are of the schweddy tryhard variety.  This is a great way for me to get my fix while waiting for the next Souls game to drop.  I knew playing as killer would be fun, but I was surprised by how much fun it is to play survivor.  Really it is best to play both to learn how both sides think and how the perks influence play (a ton). 

But if you want a casual, relaxing experience, probably skip this one.
